inventory.commentary: 6nov06 changed examples in sense 1 to clarify distinction of the sense. ahouston.

sense.name: a person who runs a goods transport business
sense.commentary: SHIPPER[+person][+business][+transporter][+goods] Note: refers to a person, an individual, -not- an organization
sense.examples: To be a shipper for that company you must be able to left 60 pounds. Many of his shippers don't speak much English.

sense.name: a business enterprise that transports goods
sense.commentary: SHIPPER[+enterprise][+business][+transporter][+goods] Note: refers to a business, not a person.
sense.examples: The government has classified these companies as trusted shippers. Their firm is a shipper of medical supplies and instruments.
